messages.body: $INTC $AAPL $QCOM $TER Intel to Supply Apple With 70% of LTE Chips Needed for 2018 iPhones & Qualcomm supplies rest  https://www.macrumors.com/2018/04/25/intel-lte-chips2018-iphones/

links.title: Intel to Supply Apple With 70% of LTE Chips Needed for 2018 iPhones
links.description: Intel is planning to supply Apple with 70 percent of the modem chips that will be used in the 2018 iPhone lineup, according an unnamed source that spoke to Fast Company . Qualcomm will allegedly provide the rest.

links.title: Samsung Elec first-quarter profit up 58 percent on-year to new record
links.description: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd (005930.KS) posted a record quarterly profit, as expected, for the three months through March, led by firm demand for memory chips.

messages.body:
$AAPL $MU $INTC $WDC $STX Samsung Tops Profit Estimates, Warns of Weak Phone Demand 
 
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-04-25/samsung-profit-beats-estimates-on-booming-memory-chip-exports

links.title: Samsung Tops Profit Estimates, Warns of Weak Phone Demand
links.description: Samsung Electronics Co. 's first-quarter profit exceeded analysts' estimates on booming exports of memory chips, but warned of challenges in smartphone demand in the coming months. Net income rose to 11.6 trillion won ($10.7 billion) in the three months ended March, the Suwon, South Korea-based company said in a filing Thursday, beating the 10.9 trillion won average of projections compiled by Bloomberg.

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-qualcomm-results/qualcomm-chip-sales-indicate-some-smartphone-strength-idUSKBN1HW2ST

links.title: Qualcomm's quarterly profit falls 51.5 percent
links.description: Qualcomm Inc's (QCOM.O) quarterly profit fell 51.5 percent due to higher costs and as the chipmaker sold fewer modem semiconductors used in mobile phones.

3 Things We Just Learned About Chip Stocks -- and It's Not All Bad News https://www.thestreet.com/investing/stocks/chip-stock-earnings-reports-feature-both-good-and-bad-news-14568794

links.title: 3 things we just learned about chip stocks -- and it's not all bad news
links.description: Though chip stocks have fallen sharply over the last two weeks as earnings season has kicked off, the numbers and commentary provided by the chip and chip equipment makers that have reported to date contain a healthy mixture of good and bad news. To be fair, M&A concerns appear to be playing some role in the selloff.
